code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(CloudNative_DockerImage) participant S as Switch
(CloudNative_HelmChart) participant B as Computadora B
(CloudNative_DockerImage) participant C as Computadora C
(CloudNative_K8sCluster) participant D as Computadora D
(CloudNative_HelmChart) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (CloudNative_K8sCluster) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
Destino: Broadcast (CloudNative_HelmChart) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (CloudNative_HelmChart) S->>C: ARP Request (CloudNative_K8sCluster) S->>D: ARP Request (CloudNative_Serverless) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
Destino: A (CloudNative_DockerImage) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (CloudNative_Serverless) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (CloudNative_HelmChart)
Destino: C (CloudNative_Serverless) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (CloudNative_HelmChart)
